	Advanced Excel skills and ability to handle large datasets.
	Strong analytical skills and attention to detail.
	Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.
	Ability to manage time efficiently and meet tight deadlines.
	Professional certification (e.g., ACCA, ICAN) .

Account Officer Job at Multipro Consumer Products Limited




        
    

        
        Multipro Consumer Products Limited is the largest company in Nigeria dealing in Sales, Haulage and Logistics. MCPL was founded in 1996 as a fully owned company of the Tolaram Group. The first product sold by MCPL in 1996 was Indomie and since then it has played a seminal role in making Indomie a household brand in Nigeria. MCPL over the years has grown adding 13 brands in various categories comprising of Noodle, Snacks, Milk, Cereal, Oil, Homecare and Personal Hygiene.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Account Officer

Job Location: Surulere - Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Purpose
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	The Account officer will manage financial transactions, ensure accurate record-keeping, and support financial reporting in the organization.
	The role involves overseeing accounts payable/receivable, handling inventory accounts, and ensuring compliance with financial regulations.


Key Responsibilities


	Manage accounts payable/receivable, process invoices, and reconcile balances.
	Monitor and account for inventory levels, ensuring accurate valuation and cost control.
	Track daily and monthly sales performance and assist in cash flow management.
	Assist in budget preparation and monitor expenses against forecasts.
	Prepare financial statements and reports, ensuring compliance with regulations.
	Ensure tax compliance and assist with audits.
	Liaise with vendors and customers on financial issues.


Requirements


	Educational Qualification: Bachelor’s Degree in Accounting, Finance, or a related field.
	Experience: 2 years+ of accounting experience.


Skills:


	Proficiency in accounting software such as SAP, QuickBooks, or any ERP system used in accounts.
	Advanced Excel skills and ability to handle large datasets.
	Strong analytical skills and attention to detail.
	Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.
	Ability to manage time efficiently and meet tight deadlines.
	Professional certification (e.g., ACCA, ICAN) .

  "title": "Sales Executive",
  "description": "Kels global ventures is a recruitment company that seeks to provide business solutions to satisfy her clients needs.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Sales Executive
Job Location:&nbsp;Ikeja, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary


	We are seeking a motivated and results-oriented Sales Executive to promote and sell hemodialysis products and equipment across Lagos and surrounding areas.
	The ideal candidate should have proven experience in medical device sales, especially within nephrology or renal care, and strong connections with hospitals, dialysis centers, and healthcare professionals.


Key Responsibilities


	Identify and develop new business opportunities within hospitals and dialysis centers.
